title: Essex National Heritage Area: Things To Do
body: Explore This Park    Plan Your Visit     Things To Do             Things To Do          Over 100 events in one weekend - all free! The last weekend in September explore outdoors, behind doors and everyway in-between! Find out about our next Trails & Sails        Rug from the Wenham Museum, Wenham MA   Experience the places that inspired the art! Art exhibits and locations throughout the Essex National Heritage Area.        Pileated Woodpecker by Phil Brown Phil Brown  Best birding sites The ENHA is a major bird migration area and a premiere place for birdwatching. Find the best spots on this list of birding sites compiled by local experts.
